channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Traffic Collision; INC#1041; 03:20PM; EB 210 Fwy east of Sunland Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUcvff; #Sunland; The fire involving the trash truck (semi tractor-trailer double) was quickly extinguished by LAFD responders. There was no immediate indication of another vehicle involved. The adult male truck driver has been transported by LAFD Paramedics to a regional trauma center in grave condition. No other injuries. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP Altadena Log #1602; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E24 E274 RA74 T74; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1041; 02:41PM; EB 210 Fwy east of Sunland Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUcvff; #Sunland; PRELIM: Overturned big rig (trash truck?) down embankment/into mountainside (with fire?). Driver of that vehicle discovered unresponsive and in grave condition. CHP Altadena Log #1602; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E24 E274 RA74 T74; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0673; 11:12AM; 2301 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VGKdaW; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision, van vs. (unspecified type or operator) 'tour bus'. No entrapment. At least five patients, no reports of serious injury. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #1988); FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; E76 E227 T27 RA27 E82 RA82 E41 RA97 T61 E261 RA35 RA56 RA60 EM18 EM14 EM11 BC5 CM52 RA827 RA889 RA810; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0194; 04:46AM; Sb 101 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/44CZaic; East Hollywood; Final patient count is 4: 1 deceased on scene, 1 transported (auto extrication required), 2 declined transportation. Ages/genders not available. Any further questions are referred to CHP (log number not available). ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA35 RA41 RA52 RA82 T27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0194; 04:26AM; Sb 101 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/44CZaic; East Hollywood; Three car collision with two cars fully involved in fire and one patient trapped. There are currently (possible to change once all persons on scene are assessed) four patients: Firefighters completed an extrication and patient #1 is being transported to the hospital in unknown condition. Patients #2 and #3 have minor, non-life threatening injuries. Patient #4 determined deceased on scene. Ages/genders of patients are unknown at this time. All SB 101FY lanes are closed and will impact morning commute for an unknown duration due to CHP fatality investigation. Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. 9-1-1 call was received at 4:02AM. No further details. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA35 RA41 RA52 RA82 T27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#0103; 02:04AM; 14423 W Dickens St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42wtPMn; Sherman Oaks; One story commercial building (approximately 100’ x 50’) had light smoke showing. 30 firefighters initiated an offensive fire attack and extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 1:37AM. No further details. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E278 E288 E99 RA88 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Technical Rescue RESCUE COMPLETE 05/07/2023 INC#1060

item.description: Update RESCUE COMPLETE Technical Rescue; INC#1060; 05:42PM; 14525 Olive View Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/42um7lS; Sylmar; Despite initial estimates, firefighters working together with a horse rescue specialist from LA Animal Services SMART, they were able to quickly dig out and get the horse on its side and then upright. It is being walked out and appears to have no injury. Resources are being released and no further details are available. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E275 E289 E89 E90 E91 EM15 H2 H7 HA2 HA7 HR3 RA889 RA89 RA91 T75 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Technical Rescue; INC#1060; 05:32PM; 14525 Olive View Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/42um7lS; Sylmar; This will be an extended duration incident, anticipating several hours. The horse is inverted in the gap and firefighters digging out the area, trying to get the horse onto it's side. The horse's condition is unknown at this time. The rider is uninjured. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E275 E289 E89 E90 E91 EM15 H2 H7 HA2 HA7 HR3 RA889 RA89 RA91 T75 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue - HORSE; INC#1060; 05:07PM; 14525 Olive View Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/42um7lS; Sylmar; Firefighters located the trapped horse (rider is not injured and it is unknown right now whether the horse is injured). Reported to be 'on its side, stuck in a narrow wedge'. Crews are getting shovels to attempt to dig out while LAFD Air Ops readies a back up plan. This is a dynamic situation with a number of options being assessed to determine the best approach. The LA Animal Services 'Specialized Mobile Animal Rescue Team (SMART) has been notified for assistance. The 9-1-1 call was received at 4:34PM. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E275 E289 E89 E90 E91 EM15 H2 H7 HA2 HA7 HR3 RA889 RA89 RA91 T75 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1688; 11:00PM; 2214 S Glyndon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LDmTWN; Venice; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 48 minutes. The home appears to be vacant and sustained significant damage with the attic fully involved in fire. One male firefighter sustained a non-life threatening injury and was unable to descend the ladder from the roof. A litter basket operation was conducted to bring him down and he was transported to the hospital. No further details.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E205 E263 E295 E62 E63 E67 EM11 RA58 RA63 T5 T63 T95; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart
